panels.description:
Total_Server_Memory used, out of Maximum_Memory limit.
Used memory is broken into data, queries, or internal.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_sec,
  concat(
  case when name = 'memsql_variables_maximum_memory' then 'MAXIMUM_MEMORY'
       when name = 'memsql_status_total_server_memory' then 'Total Memory Used'
       when name = 'memsql_status_buffer_manager_cached_memory' then 'Cached Memory'
       when name = 'memsql_status_alloc_table_memory' then 'Data'
       when name in ('memsql_status_alloc_query_execution',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_aggregator_query_execution',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_columnar_query_execution',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_query_background_tasks',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_query_execution_temp_table',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_query_ingest',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_plan_cache',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_unit_images',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_object_code_images',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_compiled_unit_sections',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_analyze',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_arena',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_autostats',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_backup_restore',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_column_store',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_columnstore_blob_cache',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_distributed_transaction',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_dqo_cache',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_external_formatter',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_external_functions',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_fulltext_search',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_json',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_mmap_memory',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_mmap_wasm',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_parametrizer',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_pipelines',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_profile_stats',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_shared_memory',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_spatial',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_spill',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_stack_first_segmented_array',
                    'memsql_status_alloc_warnings') then 'Query' else 'Other' end
  , ' ', trim_host(host), ':', port, ' (', role, ')') as metric,
  sum(intval) as value
FROM metrics
WHERE cluster = '$cluster'
and extractor = 'memsql'
and host = '$host'
and port = '$port'
and name in ('memsql_variables_maximum_memory',
            'memsql_status_total_server_memory',
            'memsql_status_buffer_manager_cached_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_aggregator_query_execution',
            'memsql_status_alloc_columnar_query_execution',
            'memsql_status_alloc_query_background_tasks',
            'memsql_status_alloc_query_execution_temp_table',
            'memsql_status_alloc_query_ingest',
            'memsql_status_alloc_column_store',
            'memsql_status_alloc_analyze',
            'memsql_status_alloc_arena',
            'memsql_status_alloc_autostats',
            'memsql_status_alloc_background_tasks',
            'memsql_status_alloc_backup_restore',
            'memsql_status_alloc_client_connection',
            'memsql_status_alloc_code_generator',
            'memsql_status_alloc_columnstore_blob_cache',
            'memsql_status_alloc_databases_list_entry',
            'memsql_status_alloc_db_tasks',
            'memsql_status_alloc_distributed_transaction',
            'memsql_status_alloc_dqo_cache',
            'memsql_status_alloc_external_formatter',
            'memsql_status_alloc_fulltext_search',
            'memsql_status_alloc_global_func',
            'memsql_status_alloc_json',
            'memsql_status_alloc_none',
            'memsql_status_alloc_parametrizer',
            'memsql_status_alloc_pipelines',
            'memsql_status_alloc_profile_stats',
            'memsql_status_alloc_protocol_packet',
            'memsql_status_alloc_replication',
            'memsql_status_alloc_security',
            'memsql_status_alloc_segmented_list',
            'memsql_status_alloc_sharding_partitions',
            'memsql_status_alloc_sharding_tables',
            'memsql_status_alloc_show_statement',
            'memsql_status_alloc_skynet_consensus',
            'memsql_status_alloc_snapshot',
            'memsql_status_alloc_spatial',
            'memsql_status_alloc_stack_first_segmented_array',
            'memsql_status_alloc_system_tasks',
            'memsql_status_alloc_table_metadata_cache',
            'memsql_status_alloc_transaction',
            'memsql_status_alloc_warnings',
            'memsql_status_buffer_manager_unrecycled_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_table_memory',
            'memsql_status_malloc_active_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_replication_large',
            'memsql_status_alloc_thread_stacks',
            'memsql_status_alloc_durability_large',
            'memsql_status_alloc_external_functions',
            'memsql_status_alloc_mmap_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_mmap_wasm',
            'memsql_status_alloc_shared_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_spill',
            'memsql_status_alloc_thread_signal_handler_altstack',
            'memsql_status_alloc_unit_ifn_thunks',
            'memsql_status_total_io_pool_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_compiled_unit_sections',
            'memsql_status_alloc_object_code_images',
            'memsql_status_alloc_plan_cache',
            'memsql_status_alloc_query_execution',
            'memsql_status_alloc_unit_images')
and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

panels.title: Total Memory Used vs Total Limit

panels.description: Memory used for query execution, code gen, and plancaching, out of Maximum_Memory limit. Query execution can consume the cache, as well as any available memory less than the total limit.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_sec,
  concat(
  case 
    when name like 'memsql_status_alloc%' then trim_metric(name, 'memsql_status_alloc_')
    when name like 'memsql_variables_%' then 'MAXIMUM_MEMORY'
  end
  , ' ', trim_host(host), ':', port, ' (', role, ')') as metric,
  sum(intval) as value
FROM metrics
WHERE cluster = '$cluster'
and extractor = 'memsql'
and host = '$host'
and port = '$port'
and name in ('memsql_variables_maximum_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_query_execution',
            'memsql_status_alloc_aggregator_query_execution',
            'memsql_status_alloc_columnar_query_execution',
            'memsql_status_alloc_query_background_tasks',
            'memsql_status_alloc_query_execution_temp_table',
            'memsql_status_alloc_query_ingest',
            'memsql_status_alloc_plan_cache',
            'memsql_status_alloc_unit_images',
            'memsql_status_alloc_object_code_images',
            'memsql_status_alloc_compiled_unit_sections',
            'memsql_status_alloc_analyze',
            'memsql_status_alloc_arena',
            'memsql_status_alloc_autostats',
            'memsql_status_alloc_backup_restore',
            'memsql_status_alloc_column_store',
            'memsql_status_alloc_columnstore_blob_cache',
            'memsql_status_alloc_distributed_transaction',
            'memsql_status_alloc_dqo_cache',
            'memsql_status_alloc_external_formatter',
            'memsql_status_alloc_external_functions',
            'memsql_status_alloc_fulltext_search',
            'memsql_status_alloc_json',
            'memsql_status_alloc_mmap_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_mmap_wasm',
            'memsql_status_alloc_parametrizer',
            'memsql_status_alloc_pipelines',
            'memsql_status_alloc_profile_stats',
            'memsql_status_alloc_shared_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_spatial',
            'memsql_status_alloc_spill',
            'memsql_status_alloc_stack_first_segmented_array',
            'memsql_status_alloc_warnings')
and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

panels.title: Query Memory Used vs Total Limit

panels.description:
Table_Memory used, out of Maximum_Table_Memory limit.
Table_primary and Variable should be the greatest allocators. The others should be small.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_sec,
  intval as value,
  concat(
  case 
    when name like 'memsql_status_alloc_%' then trim_metric(name, 'memsql_status_alloc_')
    when name like 'memsql_variables_%' then trim_metric(name, 'memsql_variables_')
  end
  , ' ', trim_host(host), ':', port, ' (', role, ')') as metric
FROM metrics
WHERE cluster = '$cluster'
and extractor = 'memsql'
and host = '$host'
and port = '$port'
and name in ( 'memsql_variables_maximum_table_memory',
              'memsql_status_alloc_variable',
              'memsql_status_alloc_table_primary',
              'memsql_status_alloc_deleted_version',
              'memsql_status_alloc_skiplist_tower',
              'memsql_status_alloc_large_variable',
              'memsql_status_alloc_hash_buckets',
              'memsql_status_alloc_internal_key_node',
              'memsql_status_alloc_table_autostats',
              'memsql_status_alloc_varbuffer_cache')
and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec ASC, value ASC

panels.title: Data Memory Used vs Data Limit

panels.description:
Memory used for internal MemSQL allocations, out of Maximum_Memory limit.
The cache holds memory in MemSQL for faster internal allocation (eg for executing queries quickly).

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_sec,
  intval as value,
  concat(
  case 
    when name like 'memsql_status_alloc%' then trim_metric(name, 'memsql_status_alloc_')
    when name like 'memsql_status_buffer_manager_%' then trim_metric(name, 'memsql_status_buffer_manager_')
    when name like 'memsql_status_%' then trim_metric(name, 'memsql_status_')
    when name like 'memsql_variables_%' then trim_metric(name, 'memsql_variables_')
  end
  , ' ', trim_host(host), ':', port, ' (', role, ')') as metric
FROM metrics
WHERE cluster = '$cluster'
and extractor = 'memsql'
and host = '$host'
and port = '$port'
and name in ('memsql_variables_maximum_memory',
            'memsql_status_alloc_background_tasks',
                       'memsql_status_alloc_client_connection',
                       'memsql_status_alloc_code_generator',
                       'memsql_status_alloc_databases_list_entry',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_db_tasks',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_global_func',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_none',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_protocol_packet',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_replication',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_security',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_segmented_list',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_sharding_partitions',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_sharding_tables',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_show_statement',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_skynet_consensus',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_snapshot',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_system_tasks',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_table_metadata_cache',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_transaction',
                      'memsql_status_buffer_manager_unrecycled_memory',
                      'memsql_status_malloc_active_memory',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_replication_large',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_thread_stacks',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_durability_large',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_thread_signal_handler_altstack',
                      'memsql_status_alloc_unit_ifn_thunks',
                      'memsql_status_total_io_pool_memory')
and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec ASC, value ASC

panels.title: Internal Memory Allocators vs Total Limit

list.definition: select distinct(host) from metrics where cluster = '$cluster' and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and host is not NULL and host != ""
list.name: host
list.query: select distinct(host) from metrics where cluster = '$cluster' and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and host is not NULL and host != ""

list.name: port
list.query: select distinct(port) from metrics where cluster = '$cluster' and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) and port is not NULL
